website_summaries.verdict: Decent comfort and durability are the main highlights of this soccer cleat, according to its wearers. It also provides an excellent grip in indoor courts using its non-marking rubber outsole. However, the cleat caused its users some blister discomfort. Set an affordable rate, the cleat does the business as an indoor cleat. For players eyeing for some inexpensive cleat that gets the job done, this is an excellent choice.
pros: A couple of reviewers felt that the Nike MercurialX Victory VI DF is an excellent cleat for indoor use due to its grip and how bouncy it is
Many customers said that these soccer cleats are comfortable to wear
A few users mentioned that the soccer cleat is durable
The Dynamic Fit collar which is featured in this model has been designed by Nike to bring a more supportive fit for the pair
A central lacing system allows for a more personalized fit for this indoor soccer shoe
cons: Blisters are a standard complaint that some purchasers raised for the Nike MercurialX Victory VI DF
A few reviewers stated that another drawback that comes hand in hand with this soccer cleat is that it’s hard to break in

customer_reviews.title: Was too small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a few years ago and it was too small- perhaps this is intended for women and not men? I thought I knew what my exact size was in numerous pairs of Nike cleats, but this made me question that.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats!!
customer_reviews.text: These cleats are great! I've ordered Nike turf cleats from Amazon before and find the fit and comfort of Nike shoes to be consistent. This is probably the third or fourth time we've stuck with Nike brand for my sons growing feet. I appreciate that I can find good cleats on Amazon prime and get free shipping to Alaska.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them! Durable as well as easy on the feet.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses for Soccer Training and indoor games. Shes picky when it comes to footwear but likes wearing these and they were an easy transition from old pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that as I feel closer to and more in ...
customer_reviews.text: The style is narrow and tight around your foot. I like that as I feel closer to and more in control of the ball. If you don't like such a tight fit, the mercurial line isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Toll

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Stiches on the left and on the right outside front are too rough and gives you cuts and blisters. This is good quality product. I have these for over a month now and still the same problem
customer_reviews.author: Orcun Tagtekin

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect, The texture on these is better than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect, The texture on these is better than the last year ones. Very easy to control curve, and spin passes/hits. I highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Bofa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the few times I was required to play on Turf
customer_reviews.author: Greenie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are tight and give me blisters. Wore 2x. Probably won't wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, durable, and true fit for my wider feet at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: J&P

customer_reviews.title: It has expanded now and I can play fine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wrong size I must say. Very stiff initially. But after playing for about a month, feels alright. Used to get a lot of ankle pain earlier. It has expanded now and I can play fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nishad Vijayakumar

customer_reviews.title: The bottom feels good. I would recommend it if you get quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: The sides are very tight, the shoe is light. Fabric made of seems cheap unlike other nike cleat bought. The bottom feels good. I would recommend it if you get quickly injured in your toe.
customer_reviews.author: Azoon

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe I wish I could wear them
customer_reviews.text: The Nike shoe size is a half size to small. Nice shoe I wish I could wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Princess of Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Son digs them
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. Teammates asked where he bought them, because they thought they were so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy, order at least 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.text: First one came very tight. I returned and got a 1/2 size up. It still felt tight, but seemed I could give it a try. I played for the first time yesterday. It is light, provides good grip on artificial turf. Overall I am happy so far. I also have an adidas mundial, which feels heavier. I also sprained my ankle twice as my base foot got weirdly stuck on the turf. Therefore, I wanted to try one with a different sole.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After one game I'm impressed. The shoes fit well and are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly with the foot, a quality as expected from nike, and especially the incredible comfort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good shoe, I ordered 7.5 and it fits well but super tight, just need to stretch it out a bit and it fits good
customer_reviews.author: Lorena V.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are amazing so the shipping and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are amazing so the shipping and customer service. However, beware of the size. I notice that cleats in all major brands (Adidas, Nike, Puma) run at least one size short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of the shors but it is small
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fix perfect. I usually wear a 8.5 but I went up .5 size.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then usual
customer_reviews.text: These were too small I tried braking them in hoping they would stretch but they never did. Used them for a few months now and I have to change shoes within 20 minutes of using them because they're just too tight. I've had the same size before and never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: JAGR

customer_reviews.title: Packing & shipping was good. The top side was softer than i had ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was little large than expected. Packing & shipping was good. The top side was softer than i had expected. Bottom side of the shoe is very good and above my expectation. Color was little washed out compared to the picture but acceptable as it is a minor difference.
customer_reviews.author: Gnanamuthu

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: At first I was sceptical as I mainly prefer leather turf shoes or if I have to go with a synthetic material I go for those with a sock like fit. This however changed my mind. Fits perfectly. Good strike on the ball when contact is made. Low profile so acceleration and stopping are a breeze. They also look great. Good turf boot.
customer_reviews.author: adrian bell

customer_reviews.title: As bad as it gets
customer_reviews.text: Are these authentic Nikes? No touch, no shot, no nothing. As bad as it gets. Stay away from these. They will render you an ineffective footballer.
customer_reviews.author: Philippus Aureolus Paracelsus

product_meta.title: Nike Men's MercurialX Victory Vi Df Ic Football Boots
product_meta.description: The Nike mercurial victory vi dynamic fit (ic) indoor/court football boot combines a tongueless upper with embossed ridges to provide the fit, touch and traction needed for today's fast-paced game.
feature_bullets: Dynamic Fit collar links the foot, ankle and lower leg.
Embossed ribbing creates friction for high speed ball control.
Tongueless construction wraps the foot for a snug fit.
Rubber compound is developed for traction on court, street and indoor surfaces.
